iti85:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti85:2.1_0: “Mendicants, meditate observing the ugliness of the body.
iti85:2.2_0: Let mindfulness of breathing be well-established right there inside you.
iti85:2.3_0: Meditate observing the impermanence of all conditions.
iti85:2.4_0: As you meditate observing the ugliness of the body, you will give up desire for the body.
iti85:2.5_0: When mindfulness of breathing is well-established right there inside you, there will be no distressing external thoughts or wishes.
iti85:2.6_0: When you meditate observing the impermanence of all conditions, ignorance is given up and knowledge arises.”
iti85:4.4_0: is a sage who has gone beyond all attachments.”
iti85:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
